name: Sir Match-a-Lot
description:
Embark on an exciting MATCH 3 journey to save the kingdom! Solve FUN & MAGICAL puzzles with Sir Match-a-lot, the little knight who has his sword ready to defeat any level. Complete unique quests, gather firefly allies and conquer villainous bosses in this addictive medieval matching game!

Tons of Worlds!
•Play over 1200 levels and over 1 dozen unique worlds
•Visit the Dragon District, Lost Island, Haunted Carnival, and MORE!
•New Match 3 worlds being added all the time

Heroic Matching
•Solve unique and colorful puzzles as you match your way through jam-packed maps
•Collect coins, keys, fireflies, and MORE to unlock new locations
•Help a young knight gain a kingdom for his valor!

Unique Game Boosts & Hero Outfits
•Outfits are the new take on matching fun!
•Wear special outfits for special boost capability in levels
•Try out each outfit to see what special powers the knight can take on!

Defeat Boss Arenas for Extra Rewards
•Match & earn keys to unlock an array of arenas
•Watch powerful match 3 moves deliver serious blows to villains!
•Earn treasure chests for your conquests
•Treasure chests are filled with fun rewards!

Enjoy Match 3 fun in a world like no other. Download Sir Match-a-lot and start your heroic journey today!

Join the Sir Match-a-lot community:
FACEBOOK: www.facebook.com/SirMatchALot
TWITTER:@sirmatchalot
INSTAGRAM: @sirmatchalot
